you-sent: Here is the information you have sent us

correct-mistakes.header: You have reported problems with your BRP
correct-mistakes.paragraph-one: Thank you for contacting UKVI about a problem with your BRP.
correct-mistakes.paragraph-one-high-load: We are currently experiencing very high volumes of requests. It is taking significantly longer than usual to resolve requests and it may take up to 20 working days.
correct-mistakes.paragraph-two-triage: Somebody from the BRP management unit will contact you within 20 working days about the issue you have reported.
correct-mistakes.paragraph-two: We investigate each case individually and in date order. We will respond to you as soon as possible.
correct-mistakes.paragraph-three: Please do not chase for updates as this reduces ability to respond in a timely manner.
correct-mistakes.paragraph-four: If you have an issue with multiple BRPs, for example your spouse's BRP or your child's BRP, then you must report the issues with each BRP separately at www.gov.uk/brp
correct-mistakes.thanks: This is an automated email, so please do not reply.
